From the brand

With more than 6 years experience in designing and manufacturing toys,CENOVE was founded in 2017.With over 1 million customers in more than 100 countries and regions around the world.We are a young team full of passion & dreams.We are committed to toy. Wish all of the children have a happy childhood.

Safety Toddler Toy:CENOVE pretend flower garden toy set is made with Eco-friendly materials. BPA-Free,Non-toxic, No smell.Smooth surface,won’t hurt kids’ hands.Meet with ASTM F963-16/-17 and CPSIA safety standards.
Easy to Clean & Organizer: Comes with a nice green carry box to organizer. All parts could be washed with water. It also could be washed in a dish washer.
Educational Tool: Learning about the parts of a plant. Bright, colorful STEM garden toys help hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.
Cool Toys Gifts for 3 4 5 6 7 Years Old Girls and Boys:Best gifts for birthday,Children’s Day,Christmas,Easter,Summer camp activities.
Creative Development:This build a bouquet craft kits allow young children to build, match and sort. They can mix and match pieces to create different flowers at will.Flower Set provides children with realistic early STEM support skills

CENOVE Build a Bouquet Floral Arrangement Playset

  • It develop the sense of beauty and creativity. Plus it’s just fun to put these flowers, stems, leaves and bases together. It is a simple but fun toy.

  • The lilies, daisies, morning glory, plum blossom, orchid, hibiscus and murraya paniculata easy-to-stack in the assorted stems for limitless fun that blossoms in all seasons. It is not only building toys for kids ages 3-6, but also it can be used for room decoration.

Safty and Durable

  • BPA-free & without coating. All parts are made of high-quality, harmless and non-toxic PP plastic.

Toddler Learning Toys

  • Help pre-school children learning about the parts of a plant.
  • With a variety of petals and leaves, children can create different flower combinations. They can play for hours without getting bored. Perfect gifts for kids.

Cute Garden Toy

  • It is not only a fun toy for indoors, but the children can also play with the flower toy in the garden. It helps to improve the eye-hand coordination of the children and cultivate the flower knowledge.

Read more

  • Package:1* Gift Box
  • 8*bases
  • 52*stem and leaf sections
  • 34* flower piece
  • 34 Stamens
  • 2*flower pot

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $23.99 - $20.82
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:24 UTC – Details)


Get your game on with Brainbolt, the mind-melting light-up memory game from the game experts at Educational Insights. Follow the lights and watch, remember, and see how long you can follow the pattern before making a mistake. Perfect for solo play, two-player mode, timed mode for quicker games, and advanced mode for expert players.
SPARK MORE CONFIDENCE! Build problem solving and sequential thinking skills, enhance memory, and grow confidence with this mind-melting, light-up, memory game
HOW TO PLAY: Challenge your brain by remembering the light sequence and following along for as long as you can without breaking the pattern. Sound easy? Not so fast! Take the challenge and see why Brainbolt is an addicting puzzle game to play until you win
SOLO OR TWO-PLAYER MODE: Challenge yourself or go head-to-head with a friend to see who can remember the most
GREAT GIFT! BrainBolt is the perfect brain teaser gift for kids, teens & adults ages 7+
READY FOR TRAVEL: BrainBolt’s handheld design is perfect to go anywhere you want to play. 3 AAA batteries come installed for instant game action

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

“NORTH BISON” brand was established in 2011, we focus on the research of kids tablet, the tablet adopts Advanced chip, Your kids will love this tablet！
Let your kids enjoy the studying and games !!!
Specifications:
Battery: 3000mAh/3.7V Li-ion Battery
Working Time: 6 hours
Language: Multi-languages
Screen: 7 inch IPS 1024*600 HD
RAM: 3GB
ROM: 32GB
OS: Android 11.0
WIFI/ BT: WIFI 802.11b/g/n+Bluetooth(HS)
Camera: 0.3MP+ 2MP

Headphone Jack: ∮3.5mm

Packing Included:
1*Tablet
1*Tablet Case
1*Screen Protector
1*USB Cable
1*OTG Cable

【Android 11.0 / 3GB + 32GB】 1024×600 IPS Eye Protection HD Touch Screen, Android 11.0 OS, 3GB RAM 32GB ROM, Support Wifi, Bluetooth, dual camera. you can expand the storage to 128 GB of SD cards for storing photos, music and videos with additional micro SD card extensions. The upgraded battery can last more than 6.5 hours, suitable for long-distance flights or road trips
【Parental Control Mode】 Kids Tablet with parental control mode, You can create and customize profiles for kids’ accounts, hand-pick content for your kids, control screen time, and ensure they are browsing safe websites. These security settings can be adjusted as kids grow with content tailored to their age. Appropriate Age Grade Over 3 years old kids
【Pre-installed Kids App】 This tablet has passed the GMS certification, It has password control, remote video control, one-button lock screen, alarm setting, and Learning,art, smart games. There are many kids free-learning apps pre-installed in our toddler tablet. You can also download many other apps like Youtube, Netflix, Disney+, ABC mouse etc, from kids store or Google play store
【Kids Tablet With Adjustable Stand】 The tablet case is made of impact-resistant soft silicone material that protects the tablet from scratches, dirt and bumps, drops, dust, etc. A colorful handle and a adjustable stand on the back of case allows toddlers to go hands-free for watching videos and video chatting with this toddler tablet. Free hand while have pleasure, make happy double
【5-year Warranty】Our kids tablet offers a 5-year warranty and Lifetime customer service, we offer a one-month trial period, we will answer your any questions within 24 hours. Package includes：1 x Tablet PC, 1 x Protective Silicone Case, 1 x screen protector , 1 x OTG cable, 1 x Data Cable, 1 x User Manual

Noah’S Ark Don’T Rock The Boat! Is A Suspenseful Balancing Game That Challenges Children’S Curiosity And Focus While Learning Animal Facts And Emotional Cues. How To Play: 1. Draw From The Animal Card Deck 2. Read The Fun Facts Out Loud 3. Find The Animal Figurine And Place On The Boat. Find The Correct Balance And Don’T Rock The Boat!
BALANCE THE ANIMALS – Take turns placing animals on the Ark until it rocks and tips over. The ark is delicately balanced, so you must be careful where you place your animal!
FOCUS AND COORDINATION – Enhance your spatial awareness and hand eye coordination by strategically placing the animals in the right spot.
EDUCATIONAL LEARNING – The Noah’s Ark set comes with many types of animals and a corresponding card with more information giving you a great opportunity to learn!
FAMILY AND FRIENDS – Spend quality time with your family and loved ones while playing the Noah’s Ark Game Set. Or give it as a gift to a friend!
ULTIMATE FUN – Each round of the Noah’s Ark game set is completely unique, with an endless possibility of scenarios. Play over and over again while having a blast!
